item.description:
Hi, we will be having a bonfire and potluck at my house in the woods, come and mingle with others as we sing songs around the fire!

If you have a musical instrument please bring one!

I have plenty of wood but do bring an chair if you have one.

There will be other meetup groups invited to this party!

If anyone has any questions you can call me at: 603-312-6735

I have a long dirt driveway which is right next to 12 Hampshire Ave and it's called "Long Pond Road" that is the road you want to walk or drive down too.

I built a very unique home so come check it out!

Parking: Please park alongside the driveway but make sure others can exit or enter.

A donation of $5 would be greatly appreciated and help in supporting this meetup group!

Thanks, See everyone there!

Peter
item.name: Bon Fire Party and Potluck!!!
